events.message: I received the wrong item in my latest order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I originally purchased.
The case was categorized under Refund based on customer mention of requesting money back for the incorrect item received.
Support representative Alice has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello! I'm Alice from customer support. I'm here to help you with the refund process for the item you received by mistake.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund, which should reflect back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate you handling this promptly.
The refund case is now marked as resolved after the confirmation of refund initiation and customer satisfaction.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and if you require any further assistance regarding your order.
Since there was no further response and the refund was confirmed, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to capture your feedback on the support you received for this refund process.
